data.title: Music Week
data.meta_description: All Music Week articles tagged with "Andy Roberts"
data.text:
Andy Roberts has exited Bauer Media after 26 years. Roberts confirmed on social media that he has left his position as Kiss group programme director. He has yet to confirm ...

Kiss has unveiled a new daytime schedule for the network Alex Mansuroglu and Andrea Zara (pictured), who were on air at 3-7pm on weekdays, now host their own individual shows.
